Never mind the Paypal Mafia, the Vimeo Mafia is where it's at...

02 May 2013

Casey Pugh Founder of VHX and Star Wars Uncut.

Patrick Moberg - Creator of Dots (and NY Post Superstar). Building at Betaworks.

Jake Lodwick - Founder of Elepath, Vimeo, College Humor.

Zach Klein - Founder of DIY, Vimeo, College Humor. Design Lead at Boxee.

Justin Ouellette - Founder of Muxtape. Built News.me, Robot and Frank. Building at Tumblr.

Ted Roden - Founder of FancyHands. Built News.me. Wrote Building the Realtime User Experience.

Zach Hoeken - Co-Founder of MakerBot.

Jonathan Marcus - Founder of Flavors.me, Goodsie. Co-Founder of Pronto.

Jack Zerby - Founder of Flavors.me, Goodsie.

Kevin Sheurs - Building at VHX. Built Goodsie Beta.

Stephen Niebauer - Community at VHX.

dalas verdugo - Community at FiftyThree.

Julia Heffernan - Head of Community at GroupMe.

Casey Donahue - Director Extraordinaire.

Please let me know if I forgot anyone : )

My name is Jack Zerby, and I am a founder and designer at Flavors.me, and Goodsie. I was the Director of Design at Vimeo, and a designer at Pentagram, Frog, and RG/A.
I listen to over 100 podcasts a month, read articles and books like a banchee, attend countless webinars, and scour the web for anything that helps build startups. I'll send you a curated list every week of everything valuable I found. Fo free.
